overview:
Harry Cymbler is responsible for the day to day running of Hot Cherry, the independent online PR and social media agency in London.

Harry is responsible for getting things done, new business, strategy, creative input and planning client campaigns.

If you would like to discuss a new campaign, please contact Harry on +44 (0) 207 424 0949, tweet him at @HarryHotCherry or email him at Harry (at) HotCherry (dot) co (dot) uk
